name: Kentucky River Community Care
description: Kentucky River Community Care (KRCC) is a private nonprofit Community Mental Health Center dedicated to improving the health and well-being of the people in Breathitt, Knott, Lee, Leslie, Letcher, Owsley, Perry, and Wolfe Counties. KRCC provides comprehensive mental health, substance abuse, and developmental disability services including crisis intervention, outpatient therapy, case management, community support, supported employment, children's services, and residential treatment programs. The organization offers 24-hour crisis services and accepts all patients regardless of ability to pay with discounts based on family size and income.
